content.text:
# 35th Gawad Urian Awards

| site = AFP Theater, Camp Aguinaldo, Quezon City
| host = Venus Raj, Angel Aquino, Butch Francisco & Zoren Legaspi
| best_picture = Ang Sayaw ng Dalawang Kaliwang Paa
| most_wins = Ang Sayaw ng Dalawang Kaliwang Paa (7)
| most_nominations = Amok  (10)
| last = 34th
| next = 36th
}}
The 35th Gawad Urian Awards () is held on June 13, 2012. Established in 1976, the Gawad Urian Awards highlights the best of Philippine cinema as decided by the Filipino Film Critics. The best Philippine films for the year 2011 are honored in a ceremony at the AFP Theater, Camp Aguinaldo in Quezon City. Veteran cinematographer Rody Lacap, who has won the Gawad Urian for Best Cinematography five times, is honored with the Lifetime Achievement Award (Natatanging Gawad Urian Award).
Winners and nominees
is a first-time Best Actress winner for her role in Thelma.]]
bags the Best Actor award for his role in the indie film, Ang Sayaw ng Dalawang Kaliwang Paa.]]
